about_the_game:
BlitzRift is in Early Access!
Please expect feature changes as we continue playtesting.

Enter the World of BlitzRift
BlitzRift is a fast-paced, 2D multiplayer battle royale where intense PvP combat meets dynamic environmental challenges. Engage in 60-second rounds where every moment counts, using a variety of weapons and throwables to outsmart your opponents.

Game Modes

  • Single Player Mode: Practice your skills solo in preparation for intense multiplayer battles.

  • PvP: Face off against other players in frenetic 1v1 combat.

Key Features

  • 360-Degree Combat: Aim and fire in any direction with intuitive mouse controls. Strategy is key—your projectiles can be blocked by obstacles in the environment.

Future plan

  • Team Deathmatch (TDM) game mode: Team up and eliminate the opposing team in this classic mode.

  • Team Capture the Flag game mode: Work with your team to capture the enemy’s flag while defending your own.

  • Dynamic Arenas: Large, vertically and horizontally expansive maps with interactive elements, traps, and destructible objects.

  • Strategic Weapon Spawns: Race towards the center to collect powerful weapons while avoiding death traps.

  • Customization & Progression: Level up and unlock skins, outfits, and weapon designs to stand out.

  • Community Features: Guilds, leaderboards, in-game chat, and more.

  • Regular Updates: Seasonal content, events, and challenges that will keep the game evolving.

Are you ready to forge your legacy in the Rift?

content_descriptors.notes: BlitzRift features intense PvP combat with moderate violence, including the use of ranged weapons and environmental hazards that may result in animated blood and damage effects. The game does not depict extreme or realistic violence but includes competitive combat situations. There is no sexual content, drug or alcohol use, or themes of self-harm. Players should expect fast-paced, strategic gameplay with mild mature themes due to its combat-centric nature.

short_description: BlitzRift is a fast-paced, 2D 360 degree multiplayer battle royale game. Engage in 60-second PvP rounds, navigate dynamic arenas with traps and hazards, and use diverse weapons to outsmart opponents. Customize your character, team up with friends, and dominate the Rift.
